CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(project_cloud__Parent__r.project_cloud__Parent__r.Name)), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(project_cloud__Parent__r.Name)), project_cloud__Parent__r.project_cloud__Parent__r.Name & '|' & project_cloud__Parent__r.Name & '|' & Name, NULL ), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(project_cloud__Parent__r.Name)), project_cloud__Parent__r.Name & '|' & Name, Name ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field helps detect and prevent duplicates
